title: A proclamation prohibiting His Majesties subjects to enter into the service of foreign Princes and lands James R.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, Henry Hills, and Thomas Newcomb ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
At head of title: "By the King."
At end of text:" Given at our court at Whitehall the second day of March 1687/8."
